main event: A long, bright red streak was observed crossing the sky over Mitchell AFB, NY on August 18, 1959.
interesting points: The object appeared to be very high altitude and was initially the length of a telephone pole on the horizon.
The object had a V-shaped trail when crossing the stars and a long red exhaust when on the horizon.
The object faded out as it moved towards the southeast horizon.
The witness was a ground observer who watched the object for about 3 minutes.
The report concludes that the object was possibly a high-flying jet aircraft with the setting sun reflecting off of it.
